headline: Brazos Safety Systems Works with Garmin to Deliver Seamless Flight Data Integration for Enhanced Flight Safety and Efficiency
summary: FORT WORTH, Texas, February 09, 2026--Brazos Safety Systems ("Brazos"), a global leader in Flight Data Monitoring (FDM) solutions for fixed-wing and helicopter aircraft, is working with Garmin to integrate Garmin’s FlyGarmin ecosystem and the Brazos FDM analytics platform. This program enables FlyGarmin users to access Brazos FDM capability with an affordable and effective service offering and will provide new insights into pilot/operator performance.
